comment: You dont need to buy the textbook, I did and we barely used it. I took his class over the summer online. He responds to emails and gives feedback. Also, very understanding. The exams are on lockdown. Study best you can because he doesnt provide a study guide, so read the e-lectures. Hes flexible!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Accessible outside class--Gives good feedback

comment: I loved this class! This class consisted of 10 dp, a concept map, 3 reading assignments, 1 group project, a midterm and a final. The mid and final are easy if you READ THE BOOK and participate. The DP topics were never boring and our assigned readings were quite interesting. Prof was always willing to answer questions. Take his class!!
Weekly chapter reading and discussion post. There are three reading worksheets and one group project but they are extremely easy. Only two tests the whole semester (midterm and final).

I took his class online and it was one of the easiest classes! He is very clear with what to do and we have 1 assignment per week along with a midterm and final. Very easy and he works with you a lot.

I'm taking this class online and it isn't too bad. He has a clear grading outline. We have a different assignment ONCE a week. Either a discussion post, paper, or group project. There was also a midterm && final. You have to respond to two people with discussion post. Willing to give extensions and sometimes does it on his own which is so helpful!!
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria--So many papers
